name: ecozoi
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ecozoi
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ecozois mission is to redefine lifestyle with eco-safe and healthy products creating sustainable happiness and making peoples lives better. Ecozoi stands for eco-friendly lifestyle. We believe that an eco-lifestyle would create a sustainable flywheel of Happiness by considerably lowering our Carbon footprint. 

To open this skill say "Alexa, open ecozoi"

Once inside the skill, you can say 
- Find me a lunch box
- What is your shipping policy
